title: Nightmares Bedtime Stories for the Wicked
description: NIGHTMARES is the big book of short (and not-so-short) stories, 395 pages, 24 stories. Included are all the stories from the anthologies Cat-O-9 Tails and Be Prepared To Die, plus many more. It's the perfect book for your commute, or bedtime reading, stories that can each be finished in a sitting.
author: Mark Souza
